_sText: My latest and best project so far! Enjoy! If you upload this map on your server please post the IP! [GameplaY] - 64 spawn points - Many well balanced hiding places (climbing, barricading and traps) - 1 secret hiding place (shoot the wall above the door of the house, where the urn is) - Very high framerate, no lags [Design] - High level of detail - 3d skybox - Cubemaps Unfortunately I had to turn HDR off because it reduced FPS too much in some areas (although I optimized as much as possible). [Update History] - (08.03.2010) v2:        now for 64 players! - (10.03.2010) v3:        added some hiding places (barricading) and a connection between helipad and villa! - (11.03.2010) v3_fix:  fixed a leak... - (15.03.2010) v4:        balanced camping spots, fixed a bug with the traps (they can't be blocked by weapons anymore) - (15.03.2010) v5:        made storage room spots weaker and the traps dont kill instantly anymore (20 dmg only and players are teleported away)
